about_the_game:
Backrooms Lost Runners


Backrooms - immerse yourself in a world of mysteries, horrors, and endless possibilities. Imagine a purgatory that has become the stuff of legends. Here, every step could be your last, and every turn reveals new secrets.

Description

You are a member of the M.E.G. organization, part of a large research group living on Level 0. Suddenly, a catastrophe strikes the camp, and it’s up to you to uncover what happened and what caused this disaster. Throughout your journey, you'll encounter survivors who you can talk to and gather valuable information from. Perhaps, in exchange for some help, you might even receive a reward...

In this story, as you navigate narrow, oppressive walls and endless spaces, facing dangerous entities and battling your own sanity, you will transform from an ordinary office drone into a seasoned survivalist.

Monsters and Puzzles

Face terrifying monsters, solve complex puzzles, and manage your character's attributes to survive. Every choice matters and could be decisive in your fight for life. But be careful: sometimes even friends may not be who they seem...

Survival on the Edge

Use cunning and intuition to avoid dangers and uncover secrets hidden in the depths of this mystical place. Only you and your skills can help you survive in this merciless world.

Cooperative Mode

Explore Backrooms with friends in a cooperative mode featuring storylines where every joint decision can be crucial. Support each other and be prepared for unexpected plot twists.

Game Features

  • Atmosphere of constant fear and tension: Immerse yourself in a world where every sound and shadow could spell danger.
  • Challenging puzzles: Logical tasks that will test your wits and resourcefulness.
  • Monsters and survival: Confront horrifying creatures and learn to use your skills to stay alive.
  • Cooperative mode: Play with friends, sharing the fears and joys of survival. Joint decisions can be the key to salvation.
  • Deep story with unexpected twists: Uncover the truth behind the catastrophe and reveal the secrets of this mysterious place.
  • Character attribute management system: Enhance your skills and become stronger with each new challenge.
  • Parkour and exploration: Use acrobatic skills to move through the world and find hidden paths.
  • Looting and resources: Find useful items and resources in camps and shelters.

Backrooms is not just a game, it’s a test of your will and intellect. Are you ready to face the unknown and survive in a world where every step could be your last? Take on the challenge and prove that you can survive in the harshest conditions. Gather your team, solve puzzles, avoid monsters, and discover what lies behind the darkness of Backrooms.

Your adventure is just beginning.

  • Processor: i5-3570 3.4 GHz 4 Core or higher (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 ti or higher
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i7-7700K 4.20 GHz or higher (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: TBA MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Backrooms: Lost Runners is a survival horror game for 4 players. Team up with your friends, explore eerie liminal maps and locations, solve challenging puzzles, avoid dangerous entities, and uncover a deep and captivating story. The AI reacts to your voice, so even a whisper can be lethal.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
